directions: Place apples in pie shell.  Mix together sugar, flour, nutmeg, and cinnamon.  Sprinkle this mixture over apples in shell.
Melt the butter or margarine and stir into cream.  Pour liquids over apples.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 35 minutes.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Apple Cream Pie
